title: Rocks and minerals
brief_description: Describes the three classes of rocks - igneous, sedimentary and metamorphic - and relates them to the natural conditions that produced them. Explains the varied uses of rocks and minerals in their natural state, including basalt, pumice, granite, limestone, sandstone, marble and others.
